trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.7开始，当使用键数组或用空格分隔的键字符串调用时， .removeData() 会删除该数组或字符串中每个键的值。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.8, any jQuery instance method (a method of jQuery.fn) can be used as a property of the object passed to the second parameter:
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.8开始，任何jQuery实例方法（ jQuery.fn 的方法）都可以用作传递给第二个参数的对象的属性：

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.8, the deferred.then() method returns a new promise that can filter the status and values of a deferred through a function, replacing the now-deprecated deferred.pipe() method. The doneFilter and failFilter functions filter the original deferred's resolved / rejected status and values. The progressFilter function filters any calls to the original deferred's notify or notifyWith methods. These filter functions can return a new value to be passed along to the promise's .done() or .fail() callbacks, or they can return another observable object (Deferred, Promise, etc) which will pass its resolved / rejected status and values to the promise's callbacks. If the filter function used is null, or not specified, the promise will be resolved or rejected with the same values as the original.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.8开始， deferred.then() 方法返回一个新的promise，可以通过函数过滤deferred的状态和值，从而取代了现在不推荐使用的 deferred.pipe() 方法。该 doneFilter 和 failFilter 功能过滤原始推迟的解决/拒绝的状态和值。该 progressFilter 功能过滤到原来推迟的任何电话 notify 或 notifyWith 方法。这些过滤器函数可以返回一个新值，以传递给promise的 .done() 或 .fail() 回调，或者它们可以返回另一个可观察对象（Deferred，Promise等），该对象将其已解析/拒绝的状态和值传递给Promise的回调。如果使用的过滤器函数为 null 或未指定，则将使用与原始值相同的值来解析或拒绝promise。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.9, passing an array of style properties to .css() will result in an object of property-value pairs. For example, to retrieve all four rendered border-width values, you could use $( elem ).css([ "borderTopWidth", "borderRightWidth", "borderBottomWidth", "borderLeftWidth" ]).
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.9开始，将样式属性数组传递给 .css() 将产生一个属性-值对对象。例如，要检索所有四个呈现的 border-width 值，可以使用 $( elem ).css([ "borderTopWidth", "borderRightWidth", "borderBottomWidth", "borderLeftWidth" ]) 。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 1.9, when the context is null or undefined the proxied function will be called with the same this object as the proxy was called with. This allows $.proxy() to be used to partially apply the arguments of a function without changing the context.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 1.9开始，当 context 为 null 或 undefined ，将使用与调用代理相同的 this 对象来调用代理函数。这允许 $.proxy() 用于部分应用函数的参数而无需更改上下文。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.0, this method is deprecated and just an alias of jQuery.uniqueSort(). Please use that method instead.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.0开始，不建议使用此方法，而只是 jQuery.uniqueSort() 的别名。请改用该方法。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.2, CSS Custom Properties (also called CSS Variables) are supported: $( "p" ).css( "--custom-property" ). Note that you need to provide the property name as-is, camelCasing it won't work as it does for regular CSS properties.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.2开始，支持CSS自定义属性（也称为CSS变量）： $( "p" ).css( "--custom-property" ) 。请注意，您需要按原样提供属性名称，camelCasing不能像常规CSS属性那样使用。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.2, CSS Custom Properties (also called CSS Variables) are supported: $( "p" ).css( "--custom-property", "value" ). Note that you need to provide the property name as-is, camelCasing it won't work as it does for regular CSS properties.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.2开始，支持CSS自定义属性（也称为CSS变量）： $( "p" ).css( "--custom-property", "value" ) 。请注意，您需要按原样提供属性名称，camelCasing不能像常规CSS属性那样使用。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.2, .contents() returns contents of <template> elements as well.
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.2开始， .contents() 也返回 <template> 元素的内容。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.4, the :eq pseudo-class is deprecated. Remove it from your selectors and filter the results later using .eq().
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.4开始，不推荐使用 :eq 伪类。从选择器中将其删除，然后稍后使用 .eq() 过滤结果。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.4, the :even pseudo-class is deprecated. Remove it from your selectors and filter the results later using .even() (available in jQuery 3.5.0 or newer).
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.4开始，不推荐使用 :even 伪类。从选择器中将其删除，并稍后使用 .even() （在jQuery 3.5.0或更高版本中可用）过滤结果。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.4, the :first pseudo-class is deprecated. Remove it from your selectors and filter the results later using .first().
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.4开始，不推荐使用 :first 伪类。从选择器中将其删除，然后使用 .first() 过滤结果。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.4, the :gt pseudo-class is deprecated. Remove it from your selectors and filter the results later using .slice(). For example, :gt(3) can be replaced with a call to .slice( 4 ) (the provided index needs to be increased by one).
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.4开始，不推荐使用 :gt 伪类。从选择器中将其删除，然后使用 .slice() 过滤结果。例如， :gt(3) 可以替换为对 .slice( 4 ) 的调用（所提供的索引需要增加一个）。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.4, the :last pseudo-class is deprecated. Remove it from your selectors and filter the results later using .last().
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.4开始，不推荐使用 :last 伪类。从选择器中将其删除，然后稍后使用 .last() 过滤结果。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.4, the :lt pseudo-class is deprecated. Remove it from your selectors and filter the results later using .slice(). For example, :lt(3) can be replaced with a call to .slice( 0, 3 ).
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.4开始，不推荐使用 :lt 伪类。从选择器中将其删除，然后使用 .slice() 过滤结果。例如， :lt(3) 可以替换为对 .slice( 0, 3 ) 的调用。

trans-unit.source: As of jQuery 3.4, the :odd pseudo-class is deprecated. Remove it from your selectors and filter the results later using .odd() (available in jQuery 3.5.0 or newer).
trans-unit.target: 从jQuery 3.4开始，不推荐使用 :odd 伪类。从选择器中将其删除，然后使用 .odd() （在jQuery 3.5.0或更高版本中可用）过滤结果。

trans-unit.source: Before jQuery 1.9, the append-to-single-element case did not create a new set, but instead returned the original set which made it difficult to use the .end() method reliably when being used with an unknown number of elements.
trans-unit.target: 在jQuery 1.9之前， append-to-element-element案例没有创建一个新集合，而是返回了原始集合，这使得在与未知数量的元素一起使用时，很难可靠地使用 .end() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Convenience: It can be called directly on a jQuery object and chained to other jQuery methods.
trans-unit.target: 便利性：可以直接在jQuery对象上调用它，并链接到其他jQuery方法。

trans-unit.source: Cross-browser consistency: The values of some attributes are reported inconsistently across browsers, and even across versions of a single browser. The .attr() method reduces such inconsistencies.
trans-unit.target: 跨浏览器一致性：某些属性的值在浏览器之间甚至在单个浏览器的版本之间报告的不一致。所述 .attr() 方法降低了这种不一致。

trans-unit.source: Delegated event handlers have the advantage that they can process events from descendant elements that are added to the document at a later time. By picking an element that is guaranteed to be present at the time the delegated event handler is attached, you can use delegated event handlers to avoid the need to frequently attach and remove event handlers. This element could be the container element of a view in a Model-View-Controller design, for example, or document if the event handler wants to monitor all bubbling events in the document. The document element is available in the head of the document before loading any other HTML, so it is safe to attach events there without waiting for the document to be ready.
trans-unit.target: 委派的事件处理程序的优势在于，它们可以处理来自后代元素的事件，这些事件在以后的时间添加到文档中。通过选择保证在附加委托事件处理程序时会出现的元素，您可以使用委托事件处理程序来避免频繁附加和删除事件处理程序的需要。此元素可以在一个模型-视图-控制器设计视图的容器元素，例如，或者 document ，如果事件处理程序要监视文档中的所有冒泡事件。在加载任何其他HTML之前， document 元素位于文档的 head ，因此可以安全地在其中附加事件，而无需等待文档准备就绪。

trans-unit.source: Delegated events have the advantage that they can process events from descendant elements that are added to the document at a later time. By picking an element that is guaranteed to be present at the time the delegated event handler is attached, you can use delegated events to avoid the need to frequently attach and remove event handlers. This element could be the container element of a view in a Model-View-Controller design, for example, or document if the event handler wants to monitor all bubbling events in the document. The document element is available in the head of the document before loading any other HTML, so it is safe to attach events there without waiting for the document to be ready.
trans-unit.target: 委派事件的优势在于，它们可以处理以后在以后添加到文档中的后代元素中的事件。通过选择保证在附加委托事件处理程序时会出现的元素，您可以使用委托事件来避免频繁附加和删除事件处理程序的需要。此元素可以在一个模型-视图-控制器设计视图的容器元素，例如，或者 document ，如果事件处理程序要监视文档中的所有冒泡事件。在加载任何其他HTML之前， document 元素在文档的 head 可用，因此可以在其中附加事件而不必等待文档准备就绪，这是安全的。

trans-unit.source: Deprecation Notice: The jqXHR.success(), jqXHR.error(), and jqXHR.complete() callbacks are removed as of jQuery 3.0. You can use jqXHR.done(), jqXHR.fail(), and jqXHR.always() instead.
trans-unit.target: 弃用通知：从jQuery 3.0开始，删除了 jqXHR.success() ， jqXHR.error() 和 jqXHR.complete() 回调。您可以使用 jqXHR.done() ， jqXHR.fail() 和 jqXHR.always() 代替。

trans-unit.source: Deprecation Notice:As of jQuery 1.8, the deferred.pipe() method is deprecated. The deferred.then() method, which replaces it, should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 弃用声明：从jQuery 1.8开始，不推荐使用deferred.pipe（）方法。应该使用代替它的 deferred.then() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Description: A factory function that returns a chainable utility object with methods to register multiple callbacks into callback queues, invoke callback queues, and relay the success or failure state of any synchronous or asynchronous function.
trans-unit.target: 描述：一个工厂函数，该函数返回一个可链接的实用程序对象，该对象具有将多个回调注册到回调队列，调用回调队列以及中继任何同步或异步函数的成功或失败状态的方法。

trans-unit.source: Description: Add handlers to be called when the Deferred object generates progress notifications.
trans-unit.target: 描述：添加Deferred对象生成进度通知时要调用的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Add handlers to be called when the Deferred object is either resolved or rejected.
trans-unit.target: 说明：添加解析或拒绝Deferred对象时要调用的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Add handlers to be called when the Deferred object is rejected.
trans-unit.target: 描述：添加拒绝Deferred对象时要调用的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Add handlers to be called when the Deferred object is resolved.
trans-unit.target: 说明：添加解析延迟对象时要调用的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Call the progressCallbacks on a Deferred object with the given args.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用给定的 args 调用Deferred对象上的progressCallbacks 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Call the progressCallbacks on a Deferred object with the given context and args.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用给定的上下文和 args 在Deferred对象上调用progressCallbacks 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determine whether a Deferred object has been rejected.
Description: Determine whether a Deferred object has been resolved.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定是否已解析延迟对象。

trans-unit.source: Description: Reject a Deferred object and call any failCallbacks with the given args.
trans-unit.target: 说明：拒绝Deferred对象，并使用给定 args 调用所有failCallbacks 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Reject a Deferred object and call any failCallbacks with the given context and args.
trans-unit.target: 说明：拒绝Deferred对象，并使用给定的 context 和 args 调用所有failCallbacks 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Resolve a Deferred object and call any doneCallbacks with the given args.
trans-unit.target: 描述：解析一个Deferred对象，并使用给定的 args 调用任何doneCallbacks 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Resolve a Deferred object and call any doneCallbacks with the given context and args.
trans-unit.target: 说明：解析Deferred对象，并使用给定的 context 和 args 调用所有doneCallbacks 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Return a Promise object to observe when all actions of a certain type bound to the collection, queued or not, have finished.
trans-unit.target: 描述：返回一个Promise对象，以观察绑定到集合的某种类型的所有操作是否已排队（已排队）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Returns whether event.stopPropagation() was ever called on this event object.
trans-unit.target: 说明：返回是否曾在此事件对象上调用过event.stopPropagation（）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Returns whether event.stopImmediatePropagation() was ever called on this event object.
trans-unit.target: 说明：返回是否曾经在此事件对象上调用event.stopImmediatePropagation（）。

trans-unit.source: Description: The DOM element that initiated the event.
Description: The current DOM element within the event bubbling phase.
trans-unit.target: 描述：事件冒泡阶段中的当前DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Utility method to filter and/or chain Deferreds.
trans-unit.target: 说明：筛选和/或链接Deferred的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: Description: A Promise-like object (or "thenable") that resolves when the document is ready.
trans-unit.target: 说明：一个类似于Promise的对象（或“ thenable”），在文档准备就绪时进行解析。

trans-unit.source: Description: A collection of properties that represent the presence of different browser features or bugs. Intended for jQuery's internal use; specific properties may be removed when they are no longer needed internally to improve page startup performance. For your own project's feature-detection needs, we strongly recommend the use of an external library such as Modernizr instead of dependency on properties in jQuery.support.
trans-unit.target: 说明：表示存在不同浏览器功能或错误的属性的集合。旨在供jQuery内部使用；内部不再需要特定属性以提高页面启动性能时，可以将其删除。为了满足您自己项目的功能检测需求，我们强烈建议您使用外部库（例如Modernizr），而不要依赖 jQuery.support 中的属性。

trans-unit.source: Description: A generic iterator function, which can be used to seamlessly iterate over both objects and arrays. Arrays and array-like objects with a length property (such as a function's arguments object) are iterated by numeric index, from 0 to length-1. Other objects are iterated via their named properties.
trans-unit.target: 说明：一个通用的迭代器函数，可用于无缝地迭代对象和数组。具有长度属性的数组和类似数组的对象（例如函数的arguments对象）通过从0到length-1的数字索引进行迭代。其他对象通过其命名属性进行迭代。

trans-unit.source: Description: A multi-purpose callbacks list object that provides a powerful way to manage callback lists.
trans-unit.target: 说明：多功能回调列表对象，提供了一种管理回调列表的强大方法。

trans-unit.source: Description: A selector representing selector passed to jQuery(), if any, when creating the original set.
trans-unit.target: 描述：一个选择器，代表创建原始集时传递给jQuery（）的选择器。

trans-unit.source: Description: A string containing the jQuery version number.
Description: Accepts a string containing a CSS selector which is then used to match a set of elements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：接受包含CSS选择器的字符串，然后该CSS选择器用于匹配一组元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Add a callback or a collection of callbacks to a callback list.
trans-unit.target: 说明：向回调列表中添加一个回调或一组回调。

trans-unit.source: Description: Add a collection of DOM elements onto the jQuery stack.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将DOM元素集合添加到jQuery堆栈中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Add handlers to be called when the Deferred object is rejected.
trans-unit.target: 描述：添加拒绝Deferred对象时要调用的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Add handlers to be called when the Deferred object is resolved, rejected, or still in progress.
trans-unit.target: 描述：添加要解析，拒绝或仍在进行Deferred对象时调用的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Add or remove one or more classes from each element in the set of matched elements, depending on either the class's presence or the value of the state argument.
trans-unit.target: 说明：根据匹配项的存在或状态参数的值，从匹配元素集中的每个元素中添加或删除一个或多个类。

trans-unit.source: Description: Add the previous set of elements on the stack to the current set, optionally filtered by a selector.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将堆栈上的前一组元素添加到当前集中，可以选择通过选择器进行过滤。

trans-unit.source: Description: Add the previous set of elements on the stack to the current set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将堆栈上的前一组元素添加到当前集中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Adds the specified class(es) to each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：将指定的类添加到匹配元素集中的每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Adjust the opacity of the matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：调整匹配元素的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: Description: An object containing all CSS properties that may be used without a unit. The .css() method uses this object to see if it may append px to unitless values.
trans-unit.target: 描述：一个对象，其中包含可以不使用单位而使用的所有CSS属性。所述 .css() 方法使用该对象，看它是否可能追加 px 到无单位的值。

trans-unit.source: Description: An optional object of data passed to an event method when the current executing handler is bound.
trans-unit.target: 描述：绑定当前执行处理程序时传递给事件方法的数据的可选对象。

trans-unit.source: Description: Attach a function to be executed before an Ajax request is sent. This is an Ajax Event.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在发送Ajax请求之前，附加要执行的功能。这是一个Ajax事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Attach a function to be executed whenever an Ajax request completes successfully. This is an Ajax Event.
trans-unit.target: 描述：每当Ajax请求成功完成时，附加一个要执行的功能。这是一个Ajax事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Attach a handler to an event for the elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将处理程序附加到元素的事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Attach a handler to an event for the elements. The handler is executed at most once per element per event type.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将处理程序附加到元素的事件。每个事件类型的每个元素最多只能执行一次处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Attach a handler to one or more events for all elements that match the selector, now or in the future, based on a specific set of root elements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：根据一组特定的根元素，现在或将来将与选择器匹配的所有元素的处理程序附加到一个或多个事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Attach an event handler for all elements which match the current selector, now and in the future.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为现在和将来与当前选择器匹配的所有元素附加一个事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Attach an event handler function for one or more events to the selected elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将一个或多个事件的事件处理函数附加到所选元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind a single handler to the matched elements, to be executed when the mouse pointer enters or leaves the elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将单个处理程序绑定到匹配的元素，以在鼠标指针进入或离开元素时执行。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to be fired when the mouse enters an element, or trigger that handler on an element.
trans-unit.target: 描述：绑定事件处理程序以在鼠标进入元素时触发，或在元素上触发该处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to be fired when the mouse leaves an element, or trigger that handler on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：绑定事件处理程序，以在鼠标离开元素时触发，或在元素上触发该处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "blur" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“模糊” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "change" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“更改” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "click" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ click” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "contextmenu" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ contextmenu” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "dblclick" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ dblclick” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "error" JavaScript event.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“错误” JavaScript事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "focus" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“焦点” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "focusin" event.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ focusin”事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "focusout" JavaScript event.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ focusout” JavaScript事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "keydown" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ keydown” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "keypress" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ keypress” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "keyup" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ keyup” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "load" JavaScript event.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“加载” JavaScript事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "mousedown" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ mousedown” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "mousemove" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ mousemove” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "mouseout" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ mouseout” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "mouseover" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ mouseover” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "mouseup" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“ mouseup” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "resize" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 描述：将事件处理程序绑定到“调整大小” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "scroll" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“滚动” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "select" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“选择” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "submit" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“提交” JavaScript事件，或在元素上触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind an event handler to the "unload" JavaScript event.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将事件处理程序绑定到“卸载” JavaScript事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind two handlers to the matched elements, to be executed when the mouse pointer enters and leaves the elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将两个处理程序绑定到匹配的元素，以在鼠标指针进入和离开元素时执行。

trans-unit.source: Description: Bind two or more handlers to the matched elements, to be executed on alternate clicks.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将两个或多个处理程序绑定到匹配的元素，以在单击时执行。

trans-unit.source: Description: Binds a function to be executed when the DOM has finished loading.
trans-unit.target: 说明：绑定要在DOM完成加载后执行的功能。

trans-unit.source: Description: Call all callbacks in a list with the given context and arguments.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用给定的上下文和参数调用列表中的所有回调。

trans-unit.source: Description: Call all of the callbacks with the given arguments.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用给定的参数调用所有回调。

trans-unit.source: Description: Check the current matched set of elements against a selector, element, or jQuery object and return true if at least one of these elements matches the given arguments.
trans-unit.target: 描述：对照选择器，元素或jQuery对象检查当前匹配的元素集，如果这些元素中至少有一个与给定参数匹配，则返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Check to see if a DOM element is a descendant of another DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 描述：检查DOM元素是否是另一个DOM元素的后代。

trans-unit.source: Description: Check to see if a DOM node is within an XML document (or is an XML document).
trans-unit.target: 描述：检查DOM节点是否在XML文档中（或是XML文档）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Check to see if an object is a plain object (created using "{}" or "new Object").
trans-unit.target: 描述：检查对象是否为普通对象（使用“ {}”或“ new Object”创建）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Check to see if an object is empty (contains no enumerable properties).
trans-unit.target: 描述：检查对象是否为空（不包含可枚举的属性）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Contains flags for the useragent, read from navigator.userAgent. This property was removed in jQuery 1.9 and is available only through the jQuery.migrate plugin. Please try to use feature detection instead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：包含从navigator.userAgent读取的useragent的标志。此属性已在jQuery 1.9中删除，仅可通过jQuery.migrate插件使用。请尝试使用功能检测。

trans-unit.source: Description: Convert an array-like object into a true JavaScript array.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将类似数组的对象转换为真正的JavaScript数组。

trans-unit.source: Description: Create a deep copy of the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：创建匹配元素集的深层副本。

trans-unit.source: Description: Create a new jQuery object with elements added to the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：创建一个新的jQuery对象，将元素添加到匹配的元素集中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Create a serialized representation of an array, a plain object, or a jQuery object suitable for use in a URL query string or Ajax request. In case a jQuery object is passed, it should contain input elements with name/value properties.
trans-unit.target: 描述：创建适合在URL查询字符串或Ajax请求中使用的数组，纯对象或jQuery对象的序列化表示形式。如果传递了jQuery对象，则它应包含具有名称/值属性的输入元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Creates DOM elements on the fly from the provided string of raw HTML.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从提供的原始HTML字符串中即时创建DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Creates a new copy of jQuery whose properties and methods can be modified without affecting the original jQuery object.
trans-unit.target: 说明：创建一个新的jQuery副本，可以在不影响原始jQuery对象的情况下修改其属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: Description: Creates an object containing a set of properties ready to be used in the definition of custom animations.
trans-unit.target: 说明：创建一个对象，该对象包含一组准备在自定义动画的定义中使用的属性。

trans-unit.source: Description: Creates an object that handles the actual transmission of Ajax data.
trans-unit.target: 描述：创建一个处理Ajax数据实际传输的对象。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determine if the callbacks have already been called at least once.
trans-unit.target: 描述：确定回调是否已经被调用至少一次。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determine if the callbacks list has been disabled.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定回调列表是否已禁用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determine if the callbacks list has been locked.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定回调列表是否已被锁定。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determine the current state of a Deferred object.
Description: Determine the internal JavaScript [[Class]] of an object.
Description: Determine whether an element has any jQuery data associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定一个元素是否具有与之关联的任何jQuery数据。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determine whether any of the matched elements are assigned the given class.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定是否为任何匹配的元素分配了给定的类。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determine whether or not the list has any callbacks attached. If a callback is provided as an argument, determine whether it is in a list.
trans-unit.target: 描述：确定列表是否附加了任何回调。如果提供了回调作为参数，请确定它是否在列表中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determine whether the argument is a window.
Description: Determine whether the argument is an array.
Description: Determines if its argument is callable as a function.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定其参数是否可以作为函数调用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Determines whether its argument represents a JavaScript number.
trans-unit.target: 说明：确定其参数是否表示一个JavaScript数字。

trans-unit.source: Description: Disable a callback list from doing anything more.
trans-unit.target: 说明：禁止回调列表执行任何其他操作。

trans-unit.source: Description: Display or hide the matched elements by animating their opacity.
trans-unit.target: 说明：通过设置匹配元素的不透明度来显示或隐藏它们。

trans-unit.source: Description: Display or hide the matched elements with a sliding motion.
trans-unit.target: 说明：滑动显示或隐藏匹配的元素。
描述：显示或隐藏匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Display the matched elements by fading them to opaque.
trans-unit.target: 描述：通过将匹配的元素淡化为不透明来显示它们。

trans-unit.source: Description: Display the matched elements with a sliding motion.
Description: Encode a set of form elements as a string for submission.
trans-unit.target: 描述：将一组表单元素编码为字符串以便提交。

trans-unit.source: Description: Encode a set of form elements as an array of names and values.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将一组表单元素编码为名称和值的数组。

trans-unit.source: Description: End the most recent filtering operation in the current chain and return the set of matched elements to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: 说明：结束当前链中的最新过滤操作，并将匹配的元素集返回到其先前状态。

trans-unit.source: Description: Escapes any character that has a special meaning in a CSS selector.
trans-unit.target: 描述：在CSS选择器中转义具有特殊含义的任何字符。

trans-unit.source: Description: Execute all handlers and behaviors attached to the matched elements for the given event type.
trans-unit.target: 说明：对于给定的事件类型，执行附加到匹配元素的所有处理程序和行为。

trans-unit.source: Description: Execute all handlers attached to an element for an event.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为事件执行附加到元素的所有处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Execute the next function on the queue for the matched element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在队列上为匹配的元素执行下一个功能。

trans-unit.source: Description: Execute the next function on the queue for the matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在队列中为匹配的元素执行下一个功能。

trans-unit.source: Description: Finds the elements of an array which satisfy a filter function. The original array is not affected.
trans-unit.target: 说明：查找满足过滤器功能的数组元素。原始阵列不受影响。

trans-unit.source: Description: For each element in the set, get the first element that matches the selector by testing the element itself and traversing up through its ancestors in the DOM tree.
trans-unit.target: 说明：对于集合中的每个元素，通过测试元素本身并遍历DOM树中的祖先，获得与选择器匹配的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: For key or mouse events, this property indicates the specific key or button that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：对于按键或鼠标事件，此属性指示所按下的特定按键或按钮。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get all following siblings of each element in the set of matched elements, optionally filtered by a selector.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中每个元素的所有后续同级，可以选择由选择器过滤。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get all following siblings of each element up to but not including the element matched by the selector, DOM node, or jQuery object passed.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取每个元素的所有后续同级，直到但不包括与选择器，DOM节点或传递的jQuery对象匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get all preceding siblings of each element in the set of matched elements, optionally filtered by a selector.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中每个元素的所有在前同级，可以选择由选择器过滤。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get all preceding siblings of each element up to but not including the element matched by the selector, DOM node, or jQuery object.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取每个元素的所有在前同级，直到但不包括与选择器，DOM节点或jQuery对象匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get an array of all the elements and selectors matched against the current element up through the DOM tree.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在DOM树中获取与当前元素匹配的所有元素和选择器的数组。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the HTML contents of the first element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素的HTML内容。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the ancestors of each element in the current set of matched elements, optionally filtered by a selector.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取当前匹配元素集中每个元素的祖先，可以选择使用选择器进行过滤。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the ancestors of each element in the current set of matched elements, up to but not including the element matched by the selector, DOM node, or jQuery object.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取当前匹配元素集中每个元素的祖先，直到但不包括与选择器，DOM节点或jQuery对象匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the children of each element in the set of matched elements, including text and comment nodes.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中每个元素的子元素，包括文本和注释节点。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the children of each element in the set of matched elements, optionally filtered by a selector.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中每个元素的子元素，可以选择使用选择器进行过滤。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the closest ancestor element that is positioned.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取所定位的最接近的祖先元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the combined text contents of each element in the set of matched elements, including their descendants.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集合中每个元素的组合文本内容，包括它们的后代。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the computed style properties for the first element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素的计算样式属性。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the current computed height for the first element in the set of matched elements, including padding but not border.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素的当前计算高度，包括填充，但不包括边框。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the current computed height for the first element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素的当前计算高度。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the current computed inner width for the first element in the set of matched elements, including padding but not border.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集合中第一个元素的当前计算内部宽度，包括填充，但不包括边框。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the current computed outer height (including padding, border, and optionally margin) for the first element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素的当前计算的外部高度（包括填充，边框和可选的边距）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the current computed outer width (including padding, border, and optionally margin) for the first element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素的当前计算的外部宽度（包括填充，边框和可选的边距）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the current computed width for the first element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素的当前计算宽度。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the current coordinates of the first element in the set of matched elements, relative to the document.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素相对于文档的当前坐标。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the current coordinates of the first element in the set of matched elements, relative to the offset parent.
trans-unit.target: 说明：获得匹配元素集中第一个元素相对于偏移父级的当前坐标。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the current horizontal position of the scroll bar for the first element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素的滚动条的当前水平位置。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the current value of the first element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the current vertical position of the scroll bar for the first element in the set of matched elements or set the vertical position of the scroll bar for every matched element.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素的滚动条的当前垂直位置，或为每个匹配元素设置滚动条的垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the descendants of each element in the current set of matched elements, filtered by a selector, jQuery object, or element.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取当前匹配元素集中每个元素的后代，并通过选择器，jQuery对象或元素进行过滤。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the immediately following sibling of each element in the set of matched elements. If a selector is provided, it retrieves the next sibling only if it matches that selector.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中每个元素的紧随其后的同级元素。如果提供了选择器，则仅当与该选择器匹配时才检索下一个同级。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the immediately preceding sibling of each element in the set of matched elements. If a selector is provided, it retrieves the previous sibling only if it matches that selector.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中每个元素的前一个同级。如果提供了选择器，则只有与该选择器匹配时，它才会检索上一个同级。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the parent of each element in the current set of matched elements, optionally filtered by a selector.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取当前匹配元素集中每个元素的父元素，可以选择通过选择器进行过滤。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the siblings of each element in the set of matched elements, optionally filtered by a selector.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中每个元素的同级元素，可以选择使用选择器进行过滤。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the value of a property for the first element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Get the value of an attribute for the first element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：获取匹配元素集中第一个元素的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Handle custom Ajax options or modify existing options before each request is sent and before they are processed by $.ajax().
trans-unit.target: 说明：处理自定义Ajax选项或修改现有选项，然后再发送每个请求，并由 $.ajax() 处理它们。

trans-unit.source: Description: Handles errors thrown synchronously in functions wrapped in jQuery().
trans-unit.target: 说明：处理在 jQuery() 中包装的函数中同步引发的错误。

trans-unit.source: Description: Hide the matched elements by fading them to transparent.
trans-unit.target: 描述：通过将匹配的元素淡化为透明来隐藏它们。

trans-unit.source: Description: Hide the matched elements with a sliding motion.
trans-unit.target: 说明：通过滑动隐藏匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Holds or releases the execution of jQuery's ready event.
trans-unit.target: 描述：保留或释放jQuery ready事件的执行。

trans-unit.source: Description: Hook directly into jQuery to override how particular CSS properties are retrieved or set, normalize CSS property naming, or create custom properties.
trans-unit.target: 描述：直接连接到jQuery，以覆盖如何检索或设置特定CSS属性，标准化CSS属性命名或创建自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: Description: If this method is called, the default action of the event will not be triggered.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果调用此方法，则不会触发事件的默认操作。

trans-unit.source: Description: Indicates whether the META key was pressed when the event fired.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指示事件触发时是否按下了META键。

trans-unit.source: Description: Insert content, specified by the parameter, after each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在匹配元素集中的每个元素之后插入由参数指定的内容。

trans-unit.source: Description: Insert content, specified by the parameter, before each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在匹配元素集中的每个元素之前插入由参数指定的内容。

trans-unit.source: Description: Insert content, specified by the parameter, to the beginning of each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将参数指定的内容插入到匹配元素集中每个元素的开头。

trans-unit.source: Description: Insert content, specified by the parameter, to the end of each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将参数指定的内容插入到匹配元素集中每个元素的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Description: Insert every element in the set of matched elements after the target.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将每个元素插入目标之后的匹配元素集中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Insert every element in the set of matched elements before the target.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将匹配元素中的每个元素插入目标之前。

trans-unit.source: Description: Insert every element in the set of matched elements to the beginning of the target.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将匹配元素集中的每个元素插入目标的开头。

trans-unit.source: Description: Insert every element in the set of matched elements to the end of the target.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将匹配元素集中的每个元素插入目标的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Description: Iterate over a jQuery object, executing a function for each matched element.
trans-unit.target: 描述：遍历jQuery对象，为每个匹配的元素执行一个函数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Keeps the rest of the handlers from being executed and prevents the event from bubbling up the DOM tree.
trans-unit.target: 说明：防止其余处理程序被执行，并防止事件使DOM树冒泡。

trans-unit.source: Description: Load JSON-encoded data from the server using a GET HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用GET HTTP请求从服务器加载JSON编码的数据。

trans-unit.source: Description: Load a JavaScript file from the server using a GET HTTP request, then execute it.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用GET HTTP请求从服务器加载JavaScript文件，然后执行它。

trans-unit.source: Description: Load data from the server and place the returned HTML into the matched element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从服务器加载数据并将返回的HTML放入匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Load data from the server and place the returned HTML into the matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从服务器加载数据并将返回的HTML放入匹配的元素中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Load data from the server using a HTTP GET request.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用HTTP GET请求从服务器加载数据。

trans-unit.source: Description: Load data from the server using a HTTP POST request.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用HTTP POST请求从服务器加载数据。

trans-unit.source: Description: Lock a callback list in its current state.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将回调列表锁定为当前状态。

trans-unit.source: Description: Manipulate the queue of functions to be executed on the matched element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：操纵要在匹配元素上执行的功能队列。

trans-unit.source: Description: Manipulate the queue of functions to be executed, once for each matched element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：对每个匹配的元素操纵一次要执行的功能队列。

trans-unit.source: Description: Matches all elements that are checked or selected.
trans-unit.target: 说明：匹配所有选中或选中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Matches elements that match all of the specified attribute filters.
trans-unit.target: 说明：匹配与所有指定的属性过滤器匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Merge the contents of an object onto the jQuery prototype to provide new jQuery instance methods.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将对象的内容合并到jQuery原型上以提供新的jQuery实例方法。

trans-unit.source: Description: Merge the contents of two arrays together into the first array.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将两个数组的内容合并到第一个数组中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Merge the contents of two or more objects together into the first object.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将两个或更多对象的内容合并到第一个对象中。

trans-unit.source: Description: Modify and filter HTML strings passed through jQuery manipulation methods.
trans-unit.target: 描述：修改和过滤通过jQuery操作方法传递的HTML字符串。

trans-unit.source: Description: Parses a string into an XML document.
Description: Parses a string into an array of DOM nodes.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将字符串解析为DOM节点数组。

trans-unit.source: Description: Pass each element in the current matched set through a function, producing a new jQuery object containing the return values.
trans-unit.target: 说明：通过函数传递当前匹配集中的每个元素，产生一个包含返回值的新jQuery对象。

trans-unit.source: Description: Perform a custom animation of a set of CSS properties.
trans-unit.target: 说明：对一组CSS属性执行自定义动画。

trans-unit.source: Description: Prevents the event from bubbling up the DOM tree, preventing any parent handlers from being notified of the event.
trans-unit.target: 描述：防止事件使DOM树冒泡，从而防止任何父处理程序收到该事件的通知。

trans-unit.source: Description: Provides a way to execute callback functions based on zero or more Thenable objects, usually Deferred objects that represent asynchronous events.
trans-unit.target: 说明：提供一种基于零个或多个thenable对象（通常是表示异步事件的Deferred对象）执行回调函数的方法。

trans-unit.source: Description: Reduce the set of matched elements to a subset specified by a range of indices.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将匹配元素的集合简化为由一系列索引指定的子集。

trans-unit.source: Description: Reduce the set of matched elements to the even ones in the set, numbered from zero.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将匹配元素的集合减少为该集合中的偶数（从零开始编号）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Reduce the set of matched elements to the final one in the set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将匹配元素的集合减少到集合中的最后一个。

trans-unit.source: Description: Reduce the set of matched elements to the first in the set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将匹配元素的集合减少到集合中的第一个。

trans-unit.source: Description: Reduce the set of matched elements to the odd ones in the set, numbered from zero.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将匹配元素的集合减少为该集合中的奇数，从零开始编号。

trans-unit.source: Description: Reduce the set of matched elements to the one at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将匹配元素的集合减少为指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Reduce the set of matched elements to those that have a descendant that matches the selector or DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将匹配元素集简化为后代与选择器或DOM元素匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Reduce the set of matched elements to those that match the selector or pass the function's test.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将匹配元素的集合简化为与选择器匹配或通过功能测试的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Register a handler to be called when Ajax requests complete with an error. This is an Ajax Event.
trans-unit.target: 描述：注册当Ajax请求完成并出现错误时要调用的处理程序。这是一个Ajax事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Register a handler to be called when Ajax requests complete. This is an AjaxEvent.
trans-unit.target: 描述：注册一个在Ajax请求完成时要调用的处理程序。这是一个AjaxEvent。

trans-unit.source: Description: Register a handler to be called when all Ajax requests have completed. This is an Ajax Event.
trans-unit.target: 描述：注册所有Ajax请求完成后要调用的处理程序。这是一个Ajax事件。

trans-unit.source: Description: Register a handler to be called when the first Ajax request begins. This is an Ajax Event.
trans-unit.target: 描述：注册第一个Ajax请求开始时要调用的处理程序。这是一个Ajax事件。
说明：放弃jQuery对 $ 变量的控制。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove a callback or a collection of callbacks from a callback list.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从回调列表中删除一个回调或一组回调。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove a handler from the event for all elements which match the current selector, based upon a specific set of root elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：基于一组特定的根元素，从事件中删除与当前选择器匹配的所有元素的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove a previously-attached event handler from the elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从元素中删除以前附加的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove a property for the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：删除一组匹配元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove a single class, multiple classes, or all classes from each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从匹配元素集中的每个元素中删除单个类，多个类或所有类。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove all child nodes of the set of matched elements from the DOM.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从DOM中删除匹配元素集的所有子节点。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove all of the callbacks from a list.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从列表中删除所有回调。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove an attribute from each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从匹配元素集中的每个元素中删除一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove elements from the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从匹配的元素集中删除元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove event handlers previously attached using .live() from the elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从元素中删除以前使用 .live() 附加的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove from the queue all items that have not yet been run.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从队列中删除所有尚未运行的项目。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove the parents of the set of matched elements from the DOM, leaving the matched elements in their place.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从DOM中删除匹配元素集的父元素，而将匹配元素保留在原处。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove the set of matched elements from the DOM.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从DOM中删除匹配的元素集。

trans-unit.source: Description: Remove the whitespace from the beginning and end of a string.
trans-unit.target: 说明：从字符串的开头和结尾删除空格。

trans-unit.source: Description: Replace each element in the set of matched elements with the provided new content and return the set of elements that was removed.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用提供的新内容替换匹配元素集中的每个元素，并返回被删除的元素集。

trans-unit.source: Description: Replace each target element with the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：用匹配的元素集替换每个目标元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Retrieve all the elements contained in the jQuery set, as an array.
trans-unit.target: 说明：以数组形式检索jQuery集中包含的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Retrieve one of the elements matched by the jQuery object.
trans-unit.target: 说明：检索与jQuery对象匹配的元素之一。

trans-unit.source: Description: Retrieve the elements matched by the jQuery object.
trans-unit.target: 说明：检索与jQuery对象匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Return a number representing the current time.
trans-unit.target: 说明：返回代表当前时间的数字。

trans-unit.source: Description: Return arbitrary data associated with the first element in the jQuery collection, as set by data() or by an HTML5 data-* attribute.
trans-unit.target: 说明：返回与jQuery集合中第一个元素相关联的任意数据，由data（）或HTML5 data-* 属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Description: Return the number of elements in the jQuery object.
Description: Return the value at the named data store for the first element in the jQuery collection, as set by data(name, value) or by an HTML5 data-* attribute.
trans-unit.target: 说明：返回在命名数据存储中jQuery集合中第一个元素的值，该值由data（name，value）或HTML5 data- *属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Description: Returns value at named data store for the element, as set by jQuery.data(element, name, value), or the full data store for the element.
trans-unit.target: 描述：返回元素的命名数据存储区中的 jQuery.data(element, name, value) ，该值由jQuery.data（element，name，value）设置，或者返回元素的完整数据存储区。

trans-unit.source: Description: Returns whether event.preventDefault() was ever called on this event object.
trans-unit.target: 说明：返回是否曾在此事件对象上调用过event.preventDefault（）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Search for a given element from among the matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：从匹配的元素中搜索给定的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Search for a specified value within an array and return its index (or -1 if not found).
trans-unit.target: 说明：在数组中搜索指定的值并返回其索引（如果未找到则返回-1）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Select all elements at an index greater than index within the matched set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择索引大于匹配集中 index 所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Select all elements at an index less than index within the matched set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择索引小于匹配集中 index 所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Select all elements that are in the progress of an animation at the time the selector is run.
trans-unit.target: 说明：运行选择器时，选择动画进行中的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Select all elements that contain the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择包含指定文本的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Select all elements that have at least one child node (either an element or text).
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择具有至少一个子节点的所有元素（元素或文本）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Select all elements that have no children (including text nodes).
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择所有没有子元素的元素（包括文本节点）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Select elements that either don't have the specified attribute, or do have the specified attribute but not with a certain value.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择不具有指定属性或具有指定属性但不具有特定值的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Select the element at index n within the matched set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择匹配集中索引 n 处的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects a single element with the given id attribute.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择具有给定id属性的单个元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all button elements and elements of type button.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择所有按钮元素和类型的按钮元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all direct child elements specified by "child" of elements specified by "parent".
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择由“父”指定的元素的“子”指定的所有直接子元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements of the specified language.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择指定语言的所有元素。
说明：选中所有类型为复选框的元素。
说明：选择文件类型的所有元素。
说明：选择图像类型的所有元素。
说明：选择密码类型的所有元素。
说明：选择单选类型的所有元素。
说明：选择所有类型为reset的元素。
描述：选择类型为Submit的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements that are descendants of a given ancestor.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择作为给定祖先的后代的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements that are headers, like h1, h2, h3 and so on.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择所有标头元素，例如h1，h2，h3等。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements that are the first among siblings of the same element name.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择所有具有相同元素名称的同级元素中的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements that are the first child of their parent.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择作为其父级的第一个子级的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements that are the last among siblings of the same element name.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择所有在相同元素名称的兄弟姐妹中的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements that are the last child of their parent.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择所有元素作为其父元素的最后一个子元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements that are the nth child of their parent in relation to siblings with the same element name.
trans-unit.target: 描述：相对于具有相同元素名称的兄弟姐妹，选择作为其父元素的第n个子元素的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements that are the nth-child of their parent, counting from the last element to the first.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择从上一个元素到第一个元素的所有元素，作为其父元素的第n个子元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements that are the nth-child of their parent.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择作为其父级的第n个子级的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements that are the only child of their parent.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择所有元素作为其父元素的唯一子元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements that do not match the given selector.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择与给定选择器不匹配的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements that have no siblings with the same element name.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择所有没有兄弟姐妹且具有相同元素名称的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements with the given class.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择具有给定类的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all elements with the given tag name.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择具有给定标签名称的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all input elements of type text.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择文本类型的所有输入元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all input, textarea, select and button elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择所有输入，文本区域，选择和按钮元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all next elements matching "next" that are immediately preceded by a sibling "prev".
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择所有与“ next”匹配的下一个元素，并紧随其后的是“ prev”。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all sibling elements that follow after the "prev" element, have the same parent, and match the filtering "siblings" selector.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择所有在“ prev”元素之后的兄弟元素，它们具有相同的父元素，并与过滤“兄弟姐妹”选择器匹配。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects all the elements that are the nth-child of their parent in relation to siblings with the same element name, counting from the last element to the first.
trans-unit.target: 描述：相对于具有相同元素名称的兄弟姐妹，选择其父元素的第n个子元素的所有元素，从最后一个元素到第一个元素进行计数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects element if it is currently focused.
trans-unit.target: 说明：如果元素当前处于焦点状态，则选择它。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects elements that have the specified attribute with a value beginning exactly with a given string.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择具有指定属性的元素，该元素的值恰好以给定字符串开头。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects elements that have the specified attribute with a value containing a given substring.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择具有指定属性且其值包含给定子字符串的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects elements that have the specified attribute with a value containing a given word, delimited by spaces.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择具有指定属性的元素，该元素的值包含给定单词，并用空格分隔。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects elements that have the specified attribute with a value either equal to a given string or starting with that string followed by a hyphen (-).
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择具有指定属性的元素，该元素的值等于给定字符串，或者以该字符串开头，后跟连字符（-）。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects elements that have the specified attribute with a value ending exactly with a given string. The comparison is case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择具有指定属性且其值完全以给定字符串结尾的元素。比较是区分大小写的。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects elements that have the specified attribute with a value exactly equal to a certain value.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择具有指定属性且其值完全等于某个特定值的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects elements that have the specified attribute, with any value.
trans-unit.target: 描述：选择具有指定属性且具有任何值的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects elements which contain at least one element that matches the specified selector.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择包含至少一个与指定选择器匹配的元素的元素。
说明：选择零索引的偶数元素。另见奇。
说明：选择零索引的偶数元素。另请参阅 :odd 。
说明：选择零索引的奇数元素。另请参阅 :even 。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects odd elements, zero-indexed. See also even.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择零索引的奇数元素。又见连。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects the combined results of all the specified selectors.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择所有指定选择器的合并结果。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects the element that is the root of the document.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择作为文档根目录的元素。
描述：选择第一个匹配的DOM元素。
说明：选择最后一个匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Selects the target element indicated by the fragment identifier of the document's URI.
trans-unit.target: 说明：选择由文档URI的片段标识符指示的目标元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: Send data to the server using a HTTP POST request.
trans-unit.target: 说明：使用HTTP POST请求将数据发送到服务器。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set a timer to delay execution of subsequent items in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置计时器以延迟队列中后续项目的执行。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set default values for future Ajax requests. Its use is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 描述：为将来的Ajax请求设置默认值。不建议使用它。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set one or more CSS properties for the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：为匹配的元素集设置一个或多个CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set one or more attributes for the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为匹配的元素集设置一个或多个属性。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set one or more properties for the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为匹配的元素集设置一个或多个属性。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set the CSS height of every matched element.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置每个匹配元素的CSS高度。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set the CSS inner height of each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置匹配元素集中每个元素的CSS内部高度。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set the CSS inner width of each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置匹配元素集中每个元素的CSS内部宽度。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set the CSS outer height of each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置匹配元素集中每个元素的CSS外部高度。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set the CSS outer width of each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置匹配元素集中每个元素的CSS外部宽度。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set the CSS width of each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置匹配元素集中每个元素的CSS宽度。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set the HTML contents of each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置匹配元素集中每个元素的HTML内容。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set the content of each element in the set of matched elements to the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将匹配元素集中每个元素的内容设置为指定的文本。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set the current coordinates of every element in the set of matched elements, relative to the document.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置匹配元素集中每个元素相对于文档的当前坐标。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set the current horizontal position of the scroll bar for each of the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为每组匹配的元素设置滚动条的当前水平位置。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set the current vertical position of the scroll bar for each of the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：为每个匹配元素设置滚动条的当前垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: Description: Set the value of each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：设置匹配元素集中每个元素的值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Show the queue of functions to be executed on the matched element.
trans-unit.target: 描述：显示要在匹配元素上执行的功能队列。

trans-unit.source: Description: Show the queue of functions to be executed on the matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：显示要在匹配元素上执行的功能队列。

trans-unit.source: Description: Sorts an array of DOM elements, in place, with the duplicates removed. Note that this only works on arrays of DOM elements, not strings or numbers.
trans-unit.target: 描述：对DOM元素数组进行适当排序，并删除重复项。请注意，这仅适用于DOM元素数组，不适用于字符串或数字。

trans-unit.source: Description: Specify a function to execute when the DOM is fully loaded.
trans-unit.target: 说明：指定在DOM完全加载时要执行的函数。

trans-unit.source: Description: States if the current page, in the user's browser, is being rendered using the W3C CSS Box Model.
trans-unit.target: 说明：说明是否正在使用W3C CSS Box Model呈现用户浏览器中的当前页面。

trans-unit.source: Description: States if the current page, in the user's browser, is being rendered using the W3C CSS Box Model. This property was removed in jQuery 1.8. Please try to use feature detection instead.
trans-unit.target: 说明：说明是否正在使用W3C CSS Box Model呈现用户浏览器中的当前页面。此属性已在jQuery 1.8中删除。请尝试使用功能检测。

trans-unit.source: Description: Stop the currently-running animation on the matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：在匹配的元素上停止当前正在运行的动画。

trans-unit.source: Description: Stop the currently-running animation, remove all queued animations, and complete all animations for the matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：停止当前正在运行的动画，删除所有排队的动画，并为匹配的元素完成所有动画。

trans-unit.source: Description: Store arbitrary data associated with the matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：存储与匹配元素关联的任意数据。

trans-unit.source: Description: Store arbitrary data associated with the specified element. Returns the value that was set.
trans-unit.target: 说明：存储与指定元素关联的任意数据。返回设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Description: Takes a function and returns a new one that will always have a particular context.
trans-unit.target: 说明：接受一个函数并返回一个始终具有特定上下文的新函数。

trans-unit.source: Description: Takes a string and throws an exception containing it.
trans-unit.target: 说明：采用字符串并引发包含该字符串的异常。

trans-unit.source: Description: Takes a well-formed JSON string and returns the resulting JavaScript value.
trans-unit.target: 说明：采用格式正确的JSON字符串并返回结果JavaScript值。

trans-unit.source: Description: The DOM node context originally passed to jQuery(); if none was passed then context will likely be the document.
trans-unit.target: 说明：最初传递给 jQuery() 的DOM节点上下文；如果没有通过，那么上下文很可能是文档。

trans-unit.source: Description: The difference in milliseconds between the time the browser created the event and January 1, 1970.
trans-unit.target: 描述：浏览器创建事件的时间与1970年1月1日之间的时间差（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: The element where the currently-called jQuery event handler was attached.
trans-unit.target: 说明：附加了当前调用的jQuery事件处理程序的元素。

trans-unit.source: Description: The last value returned by an event handler that was triggered by this event, unless the value was undefined.
trans-unit.target: 描述：事件处理程序返回的最后一个值，该值由该事件触发，除非该值是 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Description: The mouse position relative to the left edge of the document.
trans-unit.target: 说明：鼠标相对于文档左边缘的位置。

trans-unit.source: Description: The mouse position relative to the top edge of the document.
trans-unit.target: 说明：鼠标相对于文档顶部边缘的位置。

trans-unit.source: Description: The namespace specified when the event was triggered.
trans-unit.target: 说明：触发事件时指定的名称空间。

trans-unit.source: Description: The number of elements in the jQuery object.
trans-unit.target: 描述： jQuery对象中元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Description: The other DOM element involved in the event, if any.
trans-unit.target: 描述：事件中涉及的另一个DOM元素（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Description: The rate (in milliseconds) at which animations fire.
trans-unit.target: 说明：动画触发的速率（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Description: The version number of the rendering engine for the user's browser. This property was removed in jQuery 1.9 and is available only through the jQuery.migrate plugin.
trans-unit.target: 描述：用户浏览器的渲染引擎的版本号。此属性已在jQuery 1.9中删除，仅可通过jQuery.migrate插件使用。

trans-unit.source: Description: Translate all items in an array or object to new array of items.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将数组或对象中的所有项目转换为新的项目数组。

trans-unit.source: Description: Wrap an HTML structure around all elements in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将HTML结构包装在匹配元素集中的所有元素周围。

trans-unit.source: Description: Wrap an HTML structure around each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 说明：将HTML结构环绕在匹配元素集中的每个元素周围。

trans-unit.source: Description: Wrap an HTML structure around the content of each element in the set of matched elements.
trans-unit.target: 描述：将HTML结构环绕在匹配元素集中的每个元素的内容周围。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers are bound only to the currently selected elements; they must exist at the time your code makes the call to .on(). To ensure the elements are present and can be selected, place scripts after the elements in the HTML markup or perform event binding inside a document ready handler. Alternatively, use delegated event handlers to attach event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序仅绑定到当前选定的元素；它们必须在您的代码调用 .on() 时存在。为了确保元素存在并且可以选择，请将脚本放在HTML标记中的元素之后，或者在文档就绪处理程序内执行事件绑定。或者，使用委托事件处理程序来附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers are bound only to the currently selected elements; they must exist at the time your code makes the call to .on(). To ensure the elements are present and can be selected, place scripts after the elements in the HTML markup or perform event binding inside a document ready handler. Alternatively, use delegated events to attach event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序仅绑定到当前选定的元素。它们必须在您的代码调用 .on() 时存在。为了确保元素存在并且可以选择，请将脚本放在HTML标记中的元素之后，或者在文档就绪处理程序内执行事件绑定。或者，使用委托事件来附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Important: As of jQuery 1.4, if the JSON file contains a syntax error, the request will usually fail silently. Avoid frequent hand-editing of JSON data for this reason. JSON is a data-interchange format with syntax rules that are stricter than those of JavaScript's object literal notation. For example, all strings represented in JSON, whether they are properties or values, must be enclosed in double-quotes. For details on the JSON format, see http://json.org/.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：从jQuery 1.4开始，如果JSON文件包含语法错误，则请求通常会静默失败。因此，请避免对JSON数据进行频繁的手动编辑。 JSON是一种数据交换格式，其语法规则比JavaScript的对象文字符号严格。例如，以JSON表示的所有字符串，无论它们是属性还是值，都必须用双引号引起来。有关JSON格式的详细信息，请参见http://json.org/。

trans-unit.source: Important: As of jQuery 1.4, if the JSON file contains a syntax error, the request will usually fail silently. Avoid frequent hand-editing of JSON data for this reason. JSON is a data-interchange format with syntax rules that are stricter than those of JavaScript's object literal notation. For example, all strings represented in JSON, whether they are properties or values, must be enclosed in double-quotes. For details on the JSON format, see https://json.org/.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：从jQuery 1.4开始，如果JSON文件包含语法错误，则请求通常会静默失败。因此，请避免对JSON数据进行频繁的手动编辑。JSON是一种数据交换格式，其语法规则比JavaScript的对象文字表示法严格。例如，以JSON表示的所有字符串，无论它们是属性还是值，都必须用双引号引起来。有关JSON格式的详细信息，请参见https://json.org/。

trans-unit.source: Important: If the second argument is passed, the HTML string in the first argument must represent a simple element with no attributes. As of jQuery 1.4, any event type can be passed in, and the following jQuery methods can be called: val, css, html, text, data, width, height, or offset.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：如果传递了第二个参数，则第一个参数中的HTML字符串必须表示一个没有属性的简单元素。从jQuery 1.4开始，可以传入任何事件类型，并且可以调用以下jQuery方法：val，css，html，text，data，width，height或offset。

trans-unit.source: Important: the .removeProp() method should not be used to set these properties to false. Once a native property is removed, it cannot be added again. See .removeProp() for more information.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：在 .removeProp() 方法不应该使用这些属性设置为false。删除本机属性后，将无法再次添加。有关更多信息，请参见 .removeProp() 。

trans-unit.source: Important: If there is more than one target element, however, cloned copies of the inserted element will be created for each target except for the last one.
trans-unit.target: 重要说明：但是，如果有多个目标元素，则将为每个目标（最后一个目标除外）创建插入元素的克隆副本。

trans-unit.source: In jQuery 1.5, the withCredentials property was not propagated to the native XHR and thus CORS requests requiring it would ignore this flag. For this reason, we recommend using jQuery 1.5.1+ should you require the use of it.
trans-unit.target: 在jQuery 1.5中， withCredentials 属性没有传播到本机 XHR ，因此要求它的CORS请求将忽略此标志。因此，如果您需要使用jQuery 1.5.1+，我们建议您使用它。

trans-unit.source: Note: At present, using .val() on <textarea> elements strips carriage return characters from the browser-reported value. When this value is sent to the server via XHR, however, carriage returns are preserved (or added by browsers which do not include them in the raw value). A workaround for this issue can be achieved using a valHook as follows:
trans-unit.target: 注意：目前，在 <textarea> 元素上使用 .val() 会从浏览器报告的值中删除回车符。但是，当此值通过XHR发送到服务器时，回车保留（或由不包含在原始值中的浏览器添加）。可以使用valHook来解决此问题的方法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Note: If using !important in your styles, such as display: none !important, .show() will not override !important. It is recommended to use different classes with .addClass(), .removeClass() or .toggleClass(). Another approach is using .attr( "style", "display: block !important;" ); be careful, though, as it overwrites the style attribute of the element.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果在样式中使用！important，例如 display: none !important ， .show() 将不会覆盖 !important 。它建议使用不同的类与 .addClass() ， .removeClass() 或 .toggleClass() 。另一种方法是使用 .attr( "style", "display: block !important;" ) ;但是要小心，因为它会覆盖元素的style属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: Although demonstrated in the next example, it is inadvisable to bind handlers to both the click and dblclick events for the same element. The sequence of events triggered varies from browser to browser, with some receiving two click events before the dblclick and others only one. Double-click sensitivity (maximum time between clicks that is detected as a double click) can vary by operating system and browser, and is often user-configurable.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管在下一个示例中进行了说明，但不建议将处理程序绑定到同一元素的 click 和 dblclick 事件。触发事件的顺序因浏览器而异，其中一些事件在 dblclick 之前收到两个click事件，其他事件仅收到一个。双击敏感度（检测为两次单击之间的最长间隔时间）可能因操作系统和浏览器而异，并且通常可由用户配置。

trans-unit.source: Note: Changing the value of an input element using JavaScript, using .val() for example, won't fire the event.
trans-unit.target: 注意：例如，使用JavaScript更改输入元素的值，例如使用 .val() 不会触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Note: If nothing is returned in the setter function (ie. function( index, prop ){}), or if undefined is returned, the current value is not changed. This is useful for selectively setting values only when certain criteria are met.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果setter函数（即 function( index, prop ){}) undefined 返回任何内容，或者返回undefined，则当前值不会更改。仅在满足某些条件时才有选择地设置值很有用。

trans-unit.source: Note: If nothing is returned in the setter function (ie. function( index, style ){} ), or if undefined is returned, the current value is not changed. This is useful for selectively setting values only when certain criteria are met.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果在setter函数中未返回任何内容（即 function( index, style ){} ) ，或者如果返回 undefined ，则当前值不会更改。仅在满足某些条件时才有选择地设置值很有用。

trans-unit.source: Note: If nothing is returned in the setter function (ie. function(index, attr){}), or if undefined is returned, the current value is not changed. This is useful for selectively setting values only when certain criteria are met.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果在setter函数（即 function(index, attr){} ）中 undefined 返回任何内容，或者如果返回undefined，则当前值不会更改。仅在满足某些条件时才有选择地设置值很有用。

trans-unit.source: Note: The jQuery UI project extends the .animate() method by allowing some non-numeric styles such as colors to be animated. The project also includes mechanisms for specifying animations through CSS classes rather than individual attributes.
trans-unit.target: 注：该jQuery UI的项目扩展 .animate() 允许一些非数字的风格，如要设置动画的颜色的方法。该项目还包括通过CSS类而不是单个属性指定动画的机制。

trans-unit.source: Note: The returned Promise is linked to a Deferred object stored on the .data() for an element. Since the.remove() method removes the element's data as well as the element itself, it will prevent any of the element's unresolved Promises from resolving. If it is necessary to remove an element from the DOM before its Promise is resolved, use .detach() instead and follow with .removeData() after resolution.
trans-unit.target: 注意：返回的Promise链接到元素的 .data() 上存储的Deferred对象。由于 .remove() 方法将删除元素的数据以及元素本身，因此它将阻止解析任何未解决的元素的Promises。如果在解决Promise之前有必要从DOM中删除一个元素，请改用 .detach() ,并在解析后跟随 .removeData() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: To avoid unnecessary DOM manipulation, .fadeOut() will not hide an element that is already considered hidden. For information on which elements jQuery considers hidden, see :hidden Selector.
trans-unit.target: 注意：为了避免不必要的DOM操作， .fadeOut() 不会隐藏已经被视为隐藏的元素。有关jQuery认为哪些元素隐藏的信息，请参见：hidden Selector。

trans-unit.source: Note: Although style and script tags will report a value for .width() or height() when absolutely positioned and given display:block, it is strongly discouraged to call those methods on these tags. In addition to being a bad practice, the results may also prove unreliable.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管 style 和 script 标签在绝对定位并给出 display:block 时将报告 .width() 或 height() 的值，但强烈建议不要在这些标签上调用这些方法。除了是不好的做法外，结果还可能不可靠。

trans-unit.source: Note: As of jQuery 1.3, functions provided by the browser like alert() and DOM element methods like getAttribute() are not guaranteed to be detected as functions in browsers such as Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从jQuery 1.3开始，浏览器提供的功能 alert() 例如alert（）和DOM元素方法（例如 getAttribute() ))不能保证在Internet Explorer等浏览器中被检测为功能。

trans-unit.source: Note: As of jQuery 1.5.2, :text selects input elements that have no specified type attribute (in which case type="text" is implied).
trans-unit.target: 注意：从jQuery 1.5.2开始， :text 选择没有指定 type 属性的 input 元素（在这种情况下， type="text" 隐含）。

trans-unit.source: Note: As with .triggerHandler(), when calling .trigger() with an event name matches the name of a property on the object, prefixed by on (e.g. triggering click on window that has a non null onclick method), jQuery will attempt to invoke that property as a method.
trans-unit.target: 注：与 .triggerHandler() ，调用时 .trigger() 与事件名称匹配的对象上的属性，由前缀的名字 on （如触发 click 的 window ，有一个非空 onclick 方法），jQuery将尝试调用该属性作为方法。

trans-unit.source: Note: Attempting to change the type attribute on an input or button element created via document.createElement() will throw an exception on Internet Explorer 8 or older.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尝试更改通过 document.createElement() 创建的 input 或 button 元素的 type 属性，将在Internet Explorer 8或更早版本上引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Note: Attempting to change the type property (or attribute) of an input element created via HTML or already in an HTML document will result in an error being thrown by Internet Explorer 6, 7, or 8.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尝试更改通过HTML创建或已经存在于HTML文档中的 input 元素的 type 属性（或属性），将导致Internet Explorer 6、7或8引发错误。
